_header: There is a book men calls Merlins Bulbrane
_description: Metrical prophecies, English and Latin, on English history — 16 monorhyming lines followed by four monorhyming lines

BodHat56.First Lines:
Thare is a boke men calles Merlyns BulbraneThe man þat it
                    cowthe ware hym nat wit wane…
BodHat56.Last Lines:
…within half third yeer al this shal betydecallid bretayn al
                    in Ane & in blis byde
